item.title: Easier quest layout [Any Base]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[code] public void questLayout(String questName, String … lines)
{
int line = 8147;

    try
    {
        sendQuest(questName, 8144);
        clearQuestInterface();
    for(int i2 = 0; i2 < lines.length; i2++)
    sendQuest(lines[i2], ++line);
    sendQuestSomething(8143);
        showInterface(8134);
        flushOutStream();
    } catch(Exception e) {
        e.printStackTrace();
    }
}[/code]

Uses varargs, which represents an infinite amount of parameters.

Eg:

questLayout("Kingdom Wars", "I should talk to the old man by the portal", "I must have these skills:", "70 Thieving/85 Fletching/15 Mining/", "50 Smithing");

or

questLayout("Kingdom Wars", "@str@I should talk to the old man by the portal", "@str@I must have these skills:", "@str@70 Thieving/85 Fletching/15 Mining/", "@str@50 Smithing", "I should speak to the duke in lumbridge castle");

different amount of parameters, same method, get it?

ur welcome

thx to dc9 for helping me with a stupid problem I had with this.

Read full topic
